member.name: T:JanCLang.JanC
member.summary: Provides methods for running JanC source code, defining builtin methods for write (Izpisi) and read (Vnos) and registering C# delegates into the JanC environment.

member.name: M:JanCLang.JanC.RegisterWrite(System.Action{System.String})
member.summary: Method for registering JanC 'Izpisi' output action. Default is empty action.

member.name: M:JanCLang.JanC.RegisterRead(System.Func{System.String})
member.summary: Method for registering JanC 'Vnos' input function. If not registered, use of 'Vnos' keyword throws an exception.

member.name: M:JanCLang.JanC.RegisterMethod(System.String,System.Delegate)
member.summary: Method for registering an arbitrary action or function. Only int, double and string input/output data types are valid.

member.name: M:JanCLang.JanC.Run(System.String)
member.summary: Interprets and runs JanC source code.
